mapper.select: SELECT sch_id, sch_title, sch_description , sch_start, sch_end, sch_type, sch_pname, sch_backgroundColor, sch_textColor, sch_allDay FROM schedule
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET sch_title = #{sch_title}, sch_description = #{sch_description}, sch_start = #{sch_start}, sch_end = #{sch_end}, sch_type = #{sch_type}, sch_pname = #{sch_pname}, sch_backgroundColor = #{sch_backgroundColor}, sch_allDay = #{sch_allDay} WHERE sch_id = #{sch_id}
